name: Desktop Capybara Farm
description:
Virtual Capybara Desktop Farm created for my girlfriend.

This is the public release version of the project and is currently in development, so please be nice :)

How I made it: Tiktok

Comments are open if any bugs or issues are found.

IMPORTANT TIPS!!!

  • Hold the ` or ~ key on top of the capybara or island and move it with your mouse
  • If you want to close the application, just right click the icon on your taskbar and click Close Window
  • If one of the Capybaras goes missing, just close and relaunch the program

INFO

  • Initial release created in 2-3 days with Unity and Blender
  • Capybara's hand-modelled and animated

This was made using:

  • Fantasy Adventure Environment - Staggart Creations
  • Desktopia - Temporarily Unnamed Collective
  • Unity Game Engine and Blender
